ProductInfo.Features:
Manufacturer/Supplier: Toshiba. Product Type: Surveillance/Network Camera.
Image Sensor Type: CMOS. Illumination: 0.04.
Color Supported: Color. Tilt: 85 degrees 35 degrees. Swivel: 175 degrees 175 degrees. Maximum Video Resolution: 800 x 600. Optical Zoom: 3x. Connectivity Technology: Wired.
Protocols: TCP/IP, HTTP, HTTPS, UPnP, SNMP, RTP, RTSP, RTCP, IGMP, SMTP, FTP, DHCP, NTP, DNS, DDNS, PPPoE, QoS.
Network (RJ-45): Yes. Input Voltage: 12 V DC. Diameter: 7.1 inches. Package Contents: IK-WD12A Mini-Dome Network Camera, AC Adapter, Allignment Sticker, Screws, Anchor, I/O Connector, Screwdriver, QSG and Safety Guide, CD-ROM Manual.
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba Ik Wd12a Surveillance Network Camera Color Imaging Systems Wired Dome Lens Indoor
